eb0f53217d7c6b6d1fedb67430a2bce3_3.name: General: Vandalism
eb0f53217d7c6b6d1fedb67430a2bce3_3.description: Select a **Combat** or **Elite** domain to immediately get the rewards of the domain and change it to a **Blank** domain (The effects of Curios do not activate simultaneously)

7809aeae68e92730802bf96528412a92_3.name: Domain: Oblivion
7809aeae68e92730802bf96528412a92_3.description: Select an **Occurrence**, **Occurrence: Abnormal**, or **Reward** Domain. Obtain **1** Blessing(s) for every Occurrence in the domain, and turn it into **Blank** Domain

4b4e0dd89f802e267710ab7fdf34f048_3.name: Domain: Emotion
4b4e0dd89f802e267710ab7fdf34f048_3.description: After the current movement, immediately turn all adjacent domains to the right of the current domain (excluding **Boss** and **Blank**) into **Blank** Domains. For each domain changed, gain **20** Cosmic Fragments and **1** random Blessing(s)

5da32f55c0e0cd90fc6f54a6ab014935_1.name: General: Imitation
5da32f55c0e0cd90fc6f54a6ab014935_1.description: Select 1 domain (excluding **Boss**) and turn it into **Combat** Domain

927569cb77ff1d1f83f161b7daa6c800_1.name: Domain: Creation
927569cb77ff1d1f83f161b7daa6c800_1.description: Immediately turn a random domain (excluding **Boss**) into **Occurrence** Domain or **Occurrence: Abnormal** Domain

d4d6e9c442a4605402576d25cdef5256_2.name: Domain: Self
d4d6e9c442a4605402576d25cdef5256_2.description: Select 1 domain (excluding **Boss**). Immediately copy the current domain onto the selected domain and apply the **Knowledge** effect

b4af114804b8b29ffd27549473a8419b_2.name: General: Counteract
b4af114804b8b29ffd27549473a8419b_2.description: Select 1 domain (excluding **Boss**). Immediately copy the selected domain onto an adjacent domain (excluding **Boss**) and apply the **Knowledge** effect

b4af114804b8b29ffd27549473a8419b_1.name: General: Perception
b4af114804b8b29ffd27549473a8419b_1.description: Select 1 domain (excluding **Boss**) and turn **1** random adjacent domain(s) into the same type as the selected domain

9ce60577a279df29efb73ae8187286d5_3.name: General: Inspiration
9ce60577a279df29efb73ae8187286d5_3.description: Select 1 domain, copy the selected domain to **2** random location(s) on the current plane, and apply **Knowledge** to it (excluding **Boss**)

3e9004fe45a0988d162bb34f0f82947a_1.name: Domain: Classification
3e9004fe45a0988d162bb34f0f82947a_1.description: Select 1 **Combat** Domain (excluding **Boss**) and turn **2** random adjacent domain(s) into **Combat** Domain

927569cb77ff1d1f83f161b7daa6c800_2.name: General: Confirmation
927569cb77ff1d1f83f161b7daa6c800_2.description: Immediately turn 1 random **Elite** Domain or **Adventure** Domain into a Reward Domain

bc24dfbeb7a64cd22c7b636e51ccc4db_1.name: Domain: Association
bc24dfbeb7a64cd22c7b636e51ccc4db_1.description: Select 1 **Combat** or **Elite** Domain and switch it with a random domain adjacent to the current domain

c4c35ee8946c7ef84d3adaf3c25d3cc6_3.name: Beacon: Imagination
c4c35ee8946c7ef84d3adaf3c25d3cc6_3.description: Select 1 **Combat**, **Elite**, **Occurrence**, **Occurrence: Abnormal**, or **Reward** Domain and apply a random beacon to it. Then, switch it with a random domain adjacent to the current domain

eb0f53217d7c6b6d1fedb67430a2bce3_2.name: Domain: Experience
eb0f53217d7c6b6d1fedb67430a2bce3_2.description: Select 1 **Combat** domain with beacon. Immediately obtain the reward in the domain and change it into **Blank** Domain (The effects of Curios do not activate simultaneously)

9ce60577a279df29efb73ae8187286d5_1.name: General: Dialectics
9ce60577a279df29efb73ae8187286d5_1.description: Immediately copy the current domain to **1** random location(s) on the current plane and apply **Knowledge** to it (excluding **Boss**)

e23e48c6b2f680def7af867bd0016e26_2.name: General: Duel
e23e48c6b2f680def7af867bd0016e26_2.description: For every 1 domain on the current plane that contains a **Blessing Trotter** or **Curio Trotter** beacon, immediately gain **50** Cosmic Fragments. These domains then all swap their positions with a random adjacent domain.

c4c35ee8946c7ef84d3adaf3c25d3cc6_1.name: Beacon: Abstraction
c4c35ee8946c7ef84d3adaf3c25d3cc6_1.description: Immediately generates **1** random beacon(s) on the current plane

e04588c0da45bb3ff51489eef10faa61_2.name: General: Sensibility
e04588c0da45bb3ff51489eef10faa61_2.description: Immediately generates **1** **Blessing Trotter** or **Curio Trotter** beacon(s) in random **Combat** or **Elite** domain(s)

1859bb7d089a61684a297ca13bd8bc58_2.name: Knowledge: Evidence
1859bb7d089a61684a297ca13bd8bc58_2.description: Immediately generates **2** random beacon(s) in random domain(s) with **Knowledge**

49ee3871183320f3390d7d33ff9ac3c6_3.name: General: Deduction
49ee3871183320f3390d7d33ff9ac3c6_3.description: Immediately applies **Knowledge** to **3** random domain(s) that don't yet have **Knowledge** on this plane

5250a4a969982b8b0c6c01248d670c28_3.name: General: Diffusion
5250a4a969982b8b0c6c01248d670c28_3.description: Immediately generates **3** random beacon(s) in random domain(s) on this plane (This effect will not be generated again after taking effect for 1 time on this plane)

38b797f2845c3e7c8a622fe05afe8069_3.name: Knowledge: Principle
38b797f2845c3e7c8a622fe05afe8069_3.description: Immediately applies **Knowledge** to **1** domain(s) adjacent to each domain with **Knowledge** on this plane

17dd0550fa4c1f59d57d7fbdf01f43ab_1.name: Knowledge: Reflection
17dd0550fa4c1f59d57d7fbdf01f43ab_1.description: Immediately applies **Knowledge** to **1** random domain(s) that don't yet have **Knowledge** on this plane

75317810b69f77b887274ce6554eee0d_3.name: Knowledge: Arithmetic Progression
75317810b69f77b887274ce6554eee0d_3.description: Select 1 domain with **Knowledge** and apply **Knowledge** to all its adjacent domains

c5428312a88fe038f25d4f00628e79d4_1.name: Knowledge: Protectiveness
c5428312a88fe038f25d4f00628e79d4_1.description: After the current movement, immediately applies **Knowledge** to **2** random domain(s) that are about to collapse.

ac4cea890bfff8e56d6bdd4a646f69c0_1.name: General: Arithmetic
ac4cea890bfff8e56d6bdd4a646f69c0_1.description: After the current movement, immediately applies **Knowledge** to **1** random domain(s) adjacent to the domain where characters are located

ac4cea890bfff8e56d6bdd4a646f69c0_2.name: General: Exponential Explosion
ac4cea890bfff8e56d6bdd4a646f69c0_2.description: After the current movement, immediately applies **Knowledge** to all domains adjacent to the domain where characters are located

c5428312a88fe038f25d4f00628e79d4_3.name: Knowledge: Pre-sale
c5428312a88fe038f25d4f00628e79d4_3.description: After the current movement, immediately applies **Knowledge** to all domains that are about to collapse

ac261e61efa49b6f4e401b15b0af6fca_3.name: Knowledge: Wager
ac261e61efa49b6f4e401b15b0af6fca_3.description: For every type of domain that has **Knowledge** on the current plane, immediately obtain **1** random Blessing(s) (A maximum of **3** random Blessings can be obtained)

c20bf8246d8686d3302863425a81a94a_2.name: Domain: Challenge
c20bf8246d8686d3302863425a81a94a_2.description: When entering a **Combat** or **Elite** domain during the current movement, obtain **1** Blessing(s)

572fe56e8d55c442a2a5a68fd7834457_3.name: Domain: Cost
572fe56e8d55c442a2a5a68fd7834457_3.description: When entering an **Occurrence**, **Occurrence: Abnormal**, or **Reward** domains during the current movement, increase the countdown by **1**

572fe56e8d55c442a2a5a68fd7834457_2.name: General: Olfactory
572fe56e8d55c442a2a5a68fd7834457_2.description: During the current movement, when entering a domain of the same type as the one where characters are currently in, receive Blessings **1** times

3a4bf0aeb128658470d64b27311df9b4_2.name: General: Justice
3a4bf0aeb128658470d64b27311df9b4_2.description: When entering a domain with **Knowledge** during this movement, receive **100** Cosmic Fragments. When entering a domain with a beacon during this movement, receive Blessings **1** times

bfaaa223d6cbccca590061338d1db072_2.name: Knowledge: Extreme
bfaaa223d6cbccca590061338d1db072_2.description: When entering a domain with **Knowledge** during this movement, apply **Knowledge** to **3** random domains on the current plane

e2b68333ae7b177a47365e26ca3355b1_2.name: Beacon: Intimacy
e2b68333ae7b177a47365e26ca3355b1_2.description: When entering a domain with a beacon during this movement, generate **2** **Blessing Trotter** or **Curio Trotter** beacon(s) on the current plane

8c3be8be6ed8574cb256ede46b9fcb5f_3.name: Beacon: Prey
8c3be8be6ed8574cb256ede46b9fcb5f_3.description: During this movement, can move to a domain in the closest column that contains either a **Blessing Trotter** beacon or **Curio Trotter** beacon. Rewards gained from defeating Trotters is doubled

1098d12248664b23239a0e83a9162b2c_2.name: General: Observation
1098d12248664b23239a0e83a9162b2c_2.description: Can move to any domain in the next 3 columns during the current movement

9ecaacd073f2fdac49fe9924359ae262_2.name: Knowledge: Grandiose Fantasy
9ecaacd073f2fdac49fe9924359ae262_2.description: Can move to any domain with **Knowledge** during the current movement

6fc9230a43d575c6a5110360a65cc626_2.name: Beacon: Infinity
6fc9230a43d575c6a5110360a65cc626_2.description: Can move to any domain with a beacon during the current movement

1529bae43e1149be24426f13f67e4c02_2.name: General: Adventure Preference
1529bae43e1149be24426f13f67e4c02_2.description: Select 1 **Elite** or **Reward** Domain and turn it into an **Adventure** Domain

8493c6ee996ff631ccd790b4158db219_3.name: Beacon: Replacement
8493c6ee996ff631ccd790b4158db219_3.description: Select 1 domain with a beacon and immediately swap its beacon into a different type of beacon, then receive 1 random Blessing

c815a86d1ec79561d534489e5059bc44_3.name: Domain: Sell
c815a86d1ec79561d534489e5059bc44_3.description: After the current movement, for every domain that collapses, immediately obtains **30** Cosmic Fragment(s)

12621af77d1494fbc34f1989ffa7217d_3.name: Beacon: Geometry
12621af77d1494fbc34f1989ffa7217d_3.description: For every type of beacon that exists on the current plane, immediately obtain 1 random Blessing (A maximum of 3 random Blessings can be obtained)

f99f29910d81c47425420a79e9b9e1b1_2.name: Beacon: Shuffle
f99f29910d81c47425420a79e9b9e1b1_2.description: Immediately change all beacons on the current Plane into random beacons, then generate 1 random beacon

a0b580b0164dea9b430d4aff913d47ed_2.name: Knowledge: Winning Hand
a0b580b0164dea9b430d4aff913d47ed_2.description: Immediately turn 1 random domain with **Knowledge** into an **Adventure** Domain (excluding **Boss** Domains)

c5a4837fa898ecf0c83af28d9f598c8d_2.name: General: Pawn Shop
c5a4837fa898ecf0c83af28d9f598c8d_2.description: Discard Curio 1 time and obtain **100** Cosmic Fragments (This will not take effect when no Curios can be discarded)

e36a32ba7af1886aeffc45c6cb8e0885_3.name: Heterogeneity: Biphasic
e36a32ba7af1886aeffc45c6cb8e0885_3.description: Obtain 1 Curio and 1 random Negative Curio (This effect will not be generated again after taking effect for 1 time on this plane)

bd94bd7b47c21b8d8e0aa1de6319258f_3.name: Heterogeneity: Reforge
bd94bd7b47c21b8d8e0aa1de6319258f_3.description: Discard 1 Curio and obtain it again

4f524d11c12e430db47f68f8126c8f76_1.name: Heterogeneity: Consumerism
4f524d11c12e430db47f68f8126c8f76_1.description: Immediately turn **1** random domain(s) into **Transaction** Domain(s) (excluding **Boss**)

4f524d11c12e430db47f68f8126c8f76_2.name: Heterogeneity: Interest
4f524d11c12e430db47f68f8126c8f76_2.description: When entering **Transaction** Domain during this movement, obtain **150** Cosmic Fragments

8f2143a5685a5d5290f7e9730a27be70_2.name: Heterogeneity: Alienation
8f2143a5685a5d5290f7e9730a27be70_2.description: Select 1 **Elite**, **Adventure**, or **Reward** Domain and turn it into a **Transaction** Domain, then obtain **100** Cosmic Fragments

4076c4ccf19ca71dd8f31e313a9e9604_3.name: Heterogeneity: Treasure
4076c4ccf19ca71dd8f31e313a9e9604_3.description: For every Curio that you own, immediately obtain **10** Cosmic Fragments

3f7e5f30fb37b3a3b7c95b6eb042ce93_3.name: Heterogeneity: Inflation
3f7e5f30fb37b3a3b7c95b6eb042ce93_3.description: For the current movement, can move to a **Transaction** Domain in the closest column. The cost of items in that domain increases by **50%**, however both the Curio Store and the Blessing Store will contain 1 random free item

bd94bd7b47c21b8d8e0aa1de6319258f_2.name: General: Time Trade
bd94bd7b47c21b8d8e0aa1de6319258f_2.description: Consume 1 point of countdown or increase Disruption level by 1 to instantly get **200** Cosmic Fragment(s)

c5a4837fa898ecf0c83af28d9f598c8d_3.name: General: Hesitation
c5a4837fa898ecf0c83af28d9f598c8d_3.description: Obtain 1 random Negative Curio and add 1 point in the countdown (This will not take effect when no Negative Curios can be obtained)

bbbb44b20d9e6a383d905856c11f34c3_3.name: General: Phaseless
bbbb44b20d9e6a383d905856c11f34c3_3.description: Discard Curio 1 time and add **1** point(s) in the countdown (This will not take effect when no Curios can be discarded)

71a49443ecd9c8f1e23e7d7d97a67c9b_3.name: General: Colorless
71a49443ecd9c8f1e23e7d7d97a67c9b_3.description: Select 1 **Reward** or **Adventure** Domain, turn it into a **Blank** Domain, and gain **1** point(s) in the countdown

1859bb7d089a61684a297ca13bd8bc58_1.name: Knowledge: Curve
1859bb7d089a61684a297ca13bd8bc58_1.description: Select 1 domain with **Knowledge** and apply **Knowledge** to **1** of its random adjacent domains

2d74ffb5ffe4a607aecc90eba019e4a7_1.name: General: Entropy
2d74ffb5ffe4a607aecc90eba019e4a7_1.description: Select 1 domain and apply **Knowledge** to it

1859bb7d089a61684a297ca13bd8bc58_3.name: Knowledge: Subtraction
1859bb7d089a61684a297ca13bd8bc58_3.description: Select 1 domain. Make it and all its adjacent domains lose **Knowledge**. For every **Knowledge** lost in this way, receive **100** Cosmic Fragments

8f2143a5685a5d5290f7e9730a27be70_3.name: General: Topology
8f2143a5685a5d5290f7e9730a27be70_3.description: For every domain on the current plane that has **Knowledge**, immediately obtain **30** Cosmic Fragments

c833bfc8cdfd28d12c88d9a5b9a4c28b_2.name: Knowledge: Transcendence
c833bfc8cdfd28d12c88d9a5b9a4c28b_2.description: Select 1 domain with **Knowledge**, turn it into a **Blank** Domain with **Knowledge**, and obtain Blessings 1 time (excluding **Blank** and **Boss** domains)

23b3539882166114dac1e4f8bc5bd40b_1.name: General Buff: Shield
23b3539882166114dac1e4f8bc5bd40b_1.description: When entering combat during the current movement, characters gain a Shield equal to **40%** of their Max HP for **5** turns. At the beginning of each turn, this Shield additionally increases by **8%** of the affected ally's Max HP.

7e436f51501ef7fb8de8d050360062dd_1.name: General Buff: Fragility
7e436f51501ef7fb8de8d050360062dd_1.description: When entering combat this time, reduce all enemies' Effect RES by **30%** and Control RES by **30%** for **5** turns.

75d71e35ac1a1a70c0e23f469a0f85b0_1.name: General Buff: Detonation
75d71e35ac1a1a70c0e23f469a0f85b0_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, characters using their Basic ATK will deal additional DMG to enemies with DoT effects. For every 1 turn (up to **5** turns) of the target's DoT duration, deals extra DMG equal to **100%** of the original DMG and removes the DoT effect. This effect lasts for **5** turn(s)

1612f8293df25a624186723d67fd9814_1.name: General Buff: Preference
1612f8293df25a624186723d67fd9814_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, every time allies restore HP, they will restore additional HP equal to **25%** of their Max HP, lasting for **5** turn(s)

741ec763bf04448657a9a358bddb7f05_1.name: General Buff: Dexterity
741ec763bf04448657a9a358bddb7f05_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, increase the SPD of all allies by **40%** for **5** turn(s).

a90722aa29175fc83ba823d7bd5ba9af_1.name: General Buff: Baseline
a90722aa29175fc83ba823d7bd5ba9af_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, allies will not receive DMG exceeding **35%** of their Max HP in a single attack. This effect lasts for **5** turn(s), and can be triggered for up to 1 time per each turn.

e36a32ba7af1886aeffc45c6cb8e0885_1.name: General Buff: Vengeance
e36a32ba7af1886aeffc45c6cb8e0885_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, all allies' follow-up attacks ignore **100%** of the target's DEF for **5** turn(s)

7efabf0990b44ab63122645a66a2e003_1.name: General Buff: Rejuvenation
7efabf0990b44ab63122645a66a2e003_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, for every **3** Skill Point(s) allies have consumed, they recover 1 Skill Point, lasting for **5** turn(s)

512bf1946ba18cb5d07e9c437996ac6d_1.name: General Buff: Initiative
512bf1946ba18cb5d07e9c437996ac6d_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, allies casting their Ultimate will Advance their action Forward by **100%**. This effect can only be triggered once for every **2** turn(s), lasting for **5** turn(s)

c521b4c2f691c401b04a1efe7bf21c7a_1.name: General Buff: Investment
c521b4c2f691c401b04a1efe7bf21c7a_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, for every **100** Cosmic Fragments in possession, characters using attacks will deal Additional DMG equal to **25%** of their ATK to the attacked enemy target, lasting for **5** turn(s)

89b4b798edf86ff66b369d872aab5bb3_1.name: General Buff: Martyrdom
89b4b798edf86ff66b369d872aab5bb3_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, at the start of the enemy target's turn, the enemy target will consume HP equal to **8%** of their Max HP if their current HP is **50%** of their Max HP or higher. This effect lasts for **5** turn(s)

824e13071ddbf14538b6262a45459fbd_1.name: General Buff: Law
824e13071ddbf14538b6262a45459fbd_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, for every domain that has **Knowledge** on the current plane, all enemies receive a set amount of DMG equal to **15%** of their respective Max HP, not exceeding **60%** of their Max HP

c20bf8246d8686d3302863425a81a94a_1.name: General Buff: Pattern
c20bf8246d8686d3302863425a81a94a_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, all allies' ATK increases by **40%**. For every Blessing owned, increases ATK by an additional **4%**, lasting for **5** turn(s)

218330fa60bb0d4e4bfc2e86f1230e69_1.name: General Buff: Secret Box
218330fa60bb0d4e4bfc2e86f1230e69_1.description: When entering combat in this movement, all allies' Max HP increases by **30%**. For every Blessing owned, increases Max HP by an additional **3%**, lasting for **5** turn(s)

c521b4c2f691c401b04a1efe7bf21c7a_2.name: General: Attention
c521b4c2f691c401b04a1efe7bf21c7a_2.description: Immediately generates **2** **Double** or **Choice** Beacon(s) in **Occurrence**, **Occurrence: Abnormal** or **Reward** domains

7efabf0990b44ab63122645a66a2e003_2.name: General: Erasure
7efabf0990b44ab63122645a66a2e003_2.description: Choose a domain with any number of beacons in it and remove all beacons in it, then receive **150** Cosmic Fragments

8c3be8be6ed8574cb256ede46b9fcb5f_2.name: Domain: Social
8c3be8be6ed8574cb256ede46b9fcb5f_2.description: You may move to the nearest **Elite** or **Reward** domain in this movement
